snippet: Curtis Granderson and Travis d’Arnaud each hit a three-run homer on Friday night to power the Mets to their third straight win, a 14-5 victory over the Cincinnati Reds.
abstract: New York Mets beat Cincinnati Reds, 14-5, behind five home runs.
lead_paragraph: Curtis Granderson and Travis d’Arnaud each hit a three-run homer on Friday night to power the Mets to their third straight win, a 14-5 victory over the Cincinnati Reds.
